channel.title: New Beginnings v1! need people to play it and test it
channel.description:
Forums link! http://gaybeginningsforum.freesmfhosting.com/
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/loading.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/dz3.jpg[/img] donator zone
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/donarzone2.jpg[/img] more donator stuff
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/donarzone.jpg[/img] donator shops
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/autocast.jpg[/img] some monsters in donator cave
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/barrows.jpg[/img] Working Barrows mini game!!! drops are random
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/training.jpg[/img] training for reg people
[IMG]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/Tdizzel17/New%20Beginnings%20v1/tele.jpg[/img] yes! teleport tabs do work!
This is our first release of the client and its just a little sample of what is to come: ~ Jad Mini game ~ better drop rates ~ we are also looking for suggestions
New to coding so dont be harsh but i need some tips on what to fix/add and such
i have all the pk armor except vesta need help getting that in claws spec works perfectly fighting works perfect duel/staking works perfect following works perfect all specials on game works perfect 3 weps to autocast all mage books with (ancient staff, master wand, and staff of light (sol)) ::gdz ::home ::trade ::train ::varrock ::fally ::cammy ::ardy ::vmulti ::vdrags ::graves ::kbd ::gwd ::dags ::lummy ::magebank
*plus lots more*
everything that i have coded in works perfectly i just need to finish adding stuff but i figured i would release a beta version and see how it goes if u join and play and like it and earn some cool stuff im not doing a economy reset when i release the next version of the client :)
so please come and give some advise on the server and help us out much thanks pointblanked & master linux!
Client Download!!!! http://www.megaupload.com/?d=HGAYNLL0
forums are not finished yet so get ahold of me either at: msn: tdizzel17@yahoo.com email: tdizzel17@gmail.com
